channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A new film reveals just how hard it was to make the ‘female Viagra’

item.title: Term Sheet Next: Erica Wenger on elephants, branding in VC, and her first fund
item.description: In our latest Term Sheet Next, Erica Wenger’s Park Rangers Capital has raised its debut $4.3 million fund.

item.title: Why Adam Grant Recommends Giving Bad Interview Candidates Another Shot
item.description: The Wharton organizational psychologist recommends businesses give wobbly applicants a “do-over” to see how they handle job-related tasks.

item.title: 5 Signs That You’re Working With Underperformers (and They Know It)

item.title: Your electric bill has replaced the price at the pump as the hot-button, political bellwether
item.description: Residential electricity prices have skyrocketed almost 30% in four years with the AI boom expected to further pressure costs.

item.title: Melinda French Gates Just Donated $250 Million to Support Women’s Health
item.description: More than 80 nonprofits received funding after French Gates committed to donating $1 billion over two years for women’s rights.
